The package makes it easy to copy the TDSP folder structure to a new project. In particular, you can can use the [RStudio Project Templates feature](https://rstudio.github.io/rstudio-extensions/rstudio_project_templates.html#overview) to easily create a new RStudio project that contains the TDSP folders:


Select the "New Project..." option in the RStudio file menu:

![](inst/vignette_child/new_project.png)

If the `TDSP` package is installed, you will see an option for `Azure Team Data Science Process (TDSP)`

![](inst/vignette_child/new_project_tdsp.png)
